ASLMessageObject

Represents an ASL message object.

Message objects represent an asl_object_t having a type of ASL_TYPE_MSG.

  • init()

    Initializes an empty ASLMessageObject.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public init()
  • init(priorityLevel:message:)

    Initializes an ASLMessageObject having the specified priority level and message.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public init(priorityLevel: ASLPriorityLevel, message: String)

    Parameters

    priorityLevel

    The ASLPriorityLevel to use for the message being constructed.
    message

    The content of the message itself.
